entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • runtime-community leg failing for ThreadPoolMinMaxThreadsEventTest #71173
  • Document all CI pipelines that can be manually triggered in PRs #71172
  • Bad codegen for a combination of `cpblk` and constant source #71156
    7.0.0
  • Ensure Arm64 method local constants don't live next to the code #71155
    8.0.0
  • Pressing CTRL+C while polling for user input disables input echoing. #71154
  • Undo revert of Arcade update to ingest Workload Manifest task #71150
    6.0.8
  • [Android] Stack overflow crash when using dotnet-trace for profiled aot #71143
    7.0.0
  • Zip and Tar don't (re)store directory permissions #71140
  • Upgrade to .Net 6 from .Net 5 breaks authentication to oData-Webservice #71138
  • Breaking R2R (crossgen2) input bubble promise results leads to corrupted execution #71131
  • Cannot configure HttpHandler in DI with Azure Functions v4 #71130
  • JSON Contract customization remaining work #71123
    7.0.0
  • ilasm roundtrip testing should ensure roundtripped assembly file name matches baked-in assembly name #71119
    8.0.0
  • JIT ARM64: Assertion failed 'argValue->OperIsIndir()' during 'Morph - Global' #71118
    7.0.0
  • IValidateOptions and IConfigureOptions executing twice #71170
  • Conditional building of LINQ queries #71108
  • PGO: Consider extending some unroll factors in JIT #71105
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Stack overflow in crossgen2 #70385
    7.0.0
  • Test failure file_io.GetSystemTimeAsFileTime.test1 #63322
  • Assert failure: m_alignpad == 0 in libraries tests #70231
    7.0.0
  • Test failure baseservices\\threading\\regressions\\beta2\\437017\\437017.cmd #67083
  • Environment variable is not set when running published desktop app #71104
  • Test failure JIT\\Performance\\CodeQuality\\BenchmarksGame\\regex-redux\\regex-redux-1\\regex-redux-1.cmd #66922
  • UInt128 division broken on big-endian platforms #71157
  • Crash due to non-thread-safe access to Exception stack frames when using async/await #70081
    6.0.x
  • [API Proposal]: Make RateLimitPartition.Factory public #70597
  • ILGenerator computation of maxstack is too conservative #63805
    7.0.0
  • Extensive memory .net 7 preview 5 #70825
  • fgMorphArgs reorders (non-call) exception-throwing arguments #63905
    7.0.0
  • Issue on Win7 with Vectors #51206
    7.0.0
  • Azure App Service Config keyname Starting with Azure_XXX_Abc gives error . #71114
  • emitter::emitDispIns() does not print LARGEJMP instruction code on ARM64 #70849
    Future
  • Test failure JIT/Methodical/Arrays/lcs/lcsvalbox_ro/lcsvalbox_ro.cmd #70967
  • net6-android: Environment.SetEnvironmentVariable not shared with native library #71153
  • Add missing math functions defined by IEEE 754:2019 #20137
    Future
  • Different behavior of CultureInfo.GetCultureInfo(int) with ICU between Windows and Linux #71124
  • [API Proposal]: Allow multiple Global Extended Attributes entries in Tar archives with PAX format #69935
    7.0.0
  • Normalize crash buckets between .NET Core and .NET Framework #61580
    7.0.0
  • Extract_HardLinkEntry_TargetInsideDirectory test from System.Formats.Tar.Tests fails on Android/iOS/tvOS #68360
    7.0.0
  • Documented method to configure HttpMessageHandler with DI for Azure Functions V4 does not work #71133
  • [wasm][windows] Assertion in `mono_method_get_vtable_slot` for `System.Threading.Channels.Tests` #65244
    7.0.0
  • SpecialFolder ApplicationData is empty on MacOS #71125
  • [wasm] crash in the browser-bench sample with AOT #64343
    7.0.0
  • creating mTLS connection in win2019 server returns "The Local Security Authority cannot be contacted" error #71064
  • Regressions in System.Buffers.Text.Tests.Base64EncodeDecodeInPlaceTests #67592
    7.0.0
  • [Perf] Changes at 5/23/2022 7:50:08 PM #70029
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Templates initial implementation #64232
    7.0.0
  • Weird issue with stale File.GetCreationTimeUtc (Windows only) #70830
    Future
  • Test failure JIT\\Directed\\RVAInit\\nested\\nested.cmd #70876
    7.0.0
  • Grpc bidirectional streaming doesn't work with WinHttpHandler. #71088
  • [API Proposal]: [QUIC] QuicProvider #70424
    7.0.0
  • [QUIC] S.N.Quic internally ignores `MsQuicApi.IsQuicSupported` #56005
    7.0.0
  • System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicStreamTests_MockProvider.WriteCanceled_NextWriteThrows is failing on redhat.7.amd64 #55995
    Future
  • [QUIC] SendMoreThanStreamLimitRequestsConcurrently_LastWaits on Mocks hangs in CI #53688
    Future
  • Test failure net7.0-windows-Release-x64-CoreCLR_release-Windows.Amd64.Server2022.Open System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandlerTest_Http3_MsQuic.Public_Interop_Upgrade_Success #70971
  • When `SendKeepAliveFrameAsync()` fails the socket closes unexpectedly. #71109
  • System.DllNotFoundException during p/invoke shows incorrect error message. (Linux) #70963
    Future
  • AVs in emitDispJumpList #71049
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Do not CSE constant operands for `GT_SIMD` #71174
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] [iOS][Android] Fix crash in Exception.CaptureDispatchState #71171
  • Windows/Arm64: Use 8.1 atomic instructions for GC code #71169
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Disable hot/cold splitting on Unix NativeAOT #71168
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Include all error messsages to DllNotFoundException #71167
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add CET pipeline #71166
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update apphost error dialog text to put question last #71165
    area-Host
  • [WIP] Adjust regions range dynamically based on memory limits #71164
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Using /unicode when running ildasm.exe roundtrip tests #71163
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Allow more permissive forward subbing into call arguments #71161
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't create mismatched block copies in `cpblk` import #71160
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Annotate collections.specialized to be native aot compatible #71159
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/6.0] Fix Ordinal Ignore Case string compare #71158
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Globalization, 6.0.x
  • disable test Invoke_Instance_And_Static_Method_Win32_Process on Windows 11 #71152
    area-System.Management
  • Disable failing graphics tests on windows 7 #71151
    area-System.Drawing
  • [wasm][debugger] Support "supportsDebuggerProperties" from DAP #71148
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Simplify ServiceBase.ValidServiceName #71147
    area-System.ServiceProcess
  • Use IndexOfAnyExcept in a few more places #71146
    area-Meta
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Debugging WBT test failure #71144
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Mirror Microsoft.Diagnostics.NETCore.Client #71139
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Use IndexOfAny in HttpListener.HandleAuthentication #71137
    area-System.Net.Http
  • #69800 disable failing test on android #71132
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Spill all nodes multi-reg morphing does not handle #71127
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm][aot] Enabling `System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests` #71126
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 7.0.0
  • Recognize TrimMode=partial in ILCompiler targets #71117
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • Fix for issue 70385 (stack overflow in the CoreCLR runtime during SVM validation) #71135
    area-VM-coreclr
  • GCHeap::NextObj fix #71113
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [LibraryImportGenerator] Basic stateless value marshaller support #71116
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Fix Native Digits Support #71045
    area-System.Globalization, 7.0.0
  • Fix the handling of UInt128.DivideSlow on big endian platforms #71162
    area-System.Numerics
  • Fix the heuristics for L3 cache size for Arm64 #71029
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [iOS][Android] Fix crash in Exception.CaptureDispatchState #70970
    area-CoreLib-mono
  • Bump Newtonsoft.Json from 9.0.1 to 13.0.1 in /src/tests/ilverify #71141
    area-ILVerification, community-contribution, .NET
  • Make RateLimitPartition.Factory public #71145
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Work around for UriFormatException caused by \\?\ prefix in the path #71082
    area-System.Configuration
  • Add tests for `IMallocSpy` #71106
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Exposing AcosPi, AsinPi, Atan2Pi, AtanPi, CosPi, SinPi, and TanPi for ITrigonometricFunctions #71033
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Simplify NtProcessInfoHelper.GetProcessShortName #71136
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • Enable fake hot/cold splitting on ARM64 #70708
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix ILGenerator maxstack computation #70388
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution
  • Add exception interop test for validating native exception interop on Windows + CoreCLR. #70110
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • VM: Better strategy for TryReserveInitialMemory on arm64 (jump stubs) #70707
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • JIT: Stop reordering arguments throwing distinct exceptions #70893
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JSON contract customization #70435
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Avoid delegate allocation in TraceSourceLoggerProvider.GetOrAddTraceSource #71134
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Fix #70849: Print LARGEJMP instruction on ARM64 #71094
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bump Newtonsoft.Json from 9.0.1 to 13.0.1 in /src/installer/tests/TestUtils #71142
    area-Host, community-contribution, .NET
  • Revert Arcade update & Workload Manifest change #71110
    area-Infrastructure
  • [mono][debugger] Support new hot reload features from runtime #70697
    area-EnC-mono
  • Normalize Watson crash buckets between .NET Core/.NET Framework #71107
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Allow guessing canonical owning type instantiations #71120
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete SegmentCommandLine from utilcode #71111
  • Implement Tar Global Extended Attributes API changes #70869
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Reduce some allocations parsing certificates on Windows #71102
    area-System.Security
  • Fix Tar test failure in Apple OSs due to paths too long and using the wrong Tar entry format #71115
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Enable `TYP_STRUCT` `LCL_VAR/LCL_FLD` call args on x86 #70779
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete the Unix x64 implicit byref quirk #70961
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Sort ConstrainedDirectCall cells #71121
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Simplify and improve SocketAddress.Equals #71090
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Use SequenceEqual in SslCredKey.Equals #71097
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Delete duplicate helper in HttpConnection.cs #71091
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Base64 library tests: use full encoding map #71006
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Make GC Stress 4/8 work with CET #71085
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Mark simple.ilproj and nested.ilproj ilasm/ildasm roundtrip incompatible #71048
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Fix SpanHelpers.Reverse regression #70650
    area-System.Memory, 7.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Try catch for unreachable host in AltSvc H/3 upgrade test #70993
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Include all dlerror messages to DllNotFoundException #70964
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add idIsBound() check in emitDispJumpList() #71086
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove SString::UIndex and SString::UIterator as they are never used. #71103
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [mono] Extend MonoAOTCompiler Task #70851
    area-Build-mono

Updated

  • Support long pdata unwinding and save_next for floating point regs in ARM64 #69906
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Update design docs to reflect our new marshaller design from partner feedback #71017
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Separate out char marshalling rules to a separate MarshallingGeneratorFactory. #71028
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Optimize multi-dimensional array access #70271
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Change SString::GetUTF8NoConvert to GetUTF8 that converts the SString #71101
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm-mt] Add MessageChannel between browser thread and new pthreads #70908
    arch-wasm, area-Threading-mono, 7.0.0
  • Update DependencyGraphViewer to allow for DGML reading #70690
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix Tar timestamp conversion from/to string and DateTimeOffset #71038
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Arm64: Use csel and ccmp for conditional moves #67894
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Assertion prop fix #70643
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • tier0/R2R -> instrumented tier0 -> optimized tier1 #70941
    area-VM-coreclr
  • JIT: Run optRedundantBranches twice and try to compute more accurate doms #70907
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable ASAN for CoreCLR #54580
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException throw helpers #69767
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Polyfill the incremental generator ForAttributeWithMetadataName from roslyn. #70911
  • Not generate deps and config file for native aot apps #71061
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: arm64 osr funclet frame probing #70916
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize `HashCode.AddBytes` for inputs larger than 16 bytes. #70095
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • SPMI: add ability to filter during collection #70937
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable AES encryption on Browser WASM #70915
    area-System.Security
  • Implement NarrowUtf16ToAscii for AArch64 #70080
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Make SString typed on encoding #69748
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Implement HTTP/2 WebSockets #70895
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Allow ZipArchive to create duplicate entries #69524
    area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.0
  • Make the archives created on Unix have the read permissions by default #70735
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Implement UnixFileMode APIs #69980
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix -cmakeargs option handling in build.sh #70901
    community-contribution
  • 53095 enable diagnostics test #71058
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Improve Span.Reverse fast path performance #70944
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Move some CorElementType acquiring to managed #70987
    community-contribution
  • Improve and simplify `MakeTmpArgNode` #71019
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][wasm] Add a minimal version of gsharedvt for llvmonly, enabled… #70867
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Allow `TYP_STRUCT` `LCL_FLD` on the LHS of block copies #70782
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable `TYP_STRUCT` `LCL_VAR/LCL_FLD` call args on Unix x64 #70960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Switch default modules to es6 #70746
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Delete `fgMorphGetStructAddr` #71078
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Optimization. Use Min/Max intrinsics if one of arguments is constant. #69434
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm]: JavaScript interop with [JSImport] and [JSExport] attributes and Roslyn #66304
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Search native code in all R2R images in version bubble #68607
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • X509Certificates.Tests: make tests pass when rsa+sha1 signing is not supported. #70821
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Disable LTCG when building libnethost.lib for Windows. #71089
    area-Host, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • DefaultBinder named parameter support skipping default parameters #71013
    area-System.Reflection

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-22
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Hot Cold Splitting] Generate the cold code in the proper session for Unix. #1901
  • [Hot Cold Splitting] Pack the cold unwind data together #1902
  • [Hot Cold Splitting] Redesign the hot cold mapping data structure to allow fast lookup #1903
  • [Hot Cold Splitting] Optimize the exception processing to avoid repeated hot-cold mapping lookup #1904
  • [Hot Cold Splitting] GCStress testing #1905
  • [Hot Cold Splitting] Conditional hot-cold mapping generation. #1906
  • [Hot Cold Splitting] Make sure the debugger work under hot cold splitting #1907
  • [Hot Cold Splitting] Fix R2RDump to support dumping hot-cold parts together #1908
  • [Hot Cold Splitting] Fix R2RDump to dump the hot cold map #1909
  • [Hot Cold Splitting] Fix ILSpy.ReadyToRun disassembling #1910
  • [Hot Cold Splitting] Performance measurement #1911
  • [Hot Cold Splitting] Avoid relying on class code value #1912
  • [Hot Cold Splitting] Ensure SOS works with hot/cold splitting #1913

PullRequests

Created

  • Generated the cold code in the proper session #1916

Merged

  • Add Hot-Cold splitting experiment #1915
  • Update branding and owners for hot-cold splitting #1914

Updated

  • Empty Assembly Functionality #1899

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unhandled Exception: System.Reflection.TargetInvocationException #26183
  • Add a `-t/--target` option to the `build` and `msbuild` commands to make it easier to specify the MSBuild target to execute #26176
  • need a real authenticode build step; msbuild signtool doesn't cut it #26170
  • clarify API Compatibility rules on interface members #26169
  • Create FabricBot rule for compat issues #26166
  • Add a `--profile` option to `dotnet publish` to expose PublishProfiles as first-class concepts. #26161
  • dotnet workload commands cannot be executed on a remote machine using PowerShell #26156

Closed

  • Warning appears about not specifying self-contained when PublishAot are set #25808
    7.0.1xx
  • Reenable test File_contains_certificates_very_commonly_used_in_NuGet_org_package_signatures #26115

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #26177
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Not generate deps and config file for native aot apps #26175
    Area-ILLink
  • Bump NewtonSoft.Json from 9.0.1 to 13.0.1 in /src/Assets/TestProjects/MultiDependentProject #26173
    Area-Infrastructure, dependencies
  • Bump Newtonsoft.Json from 11.0.2 to 13.0.1 in /src/Assets/TestProjects/ComServerWithDependencies #26172
    Area-Infrastructure, dependencies
  • Bump NewtonSoft.Json from 9.0.1 to 13.0.1 in /src/Assets/TestProjects/NewtonSoftDependentProject #26171
    Area-Infrastructure, dependencies
  • Bump Newtonsoft.Json from 9.0.1 to 13.0.1 in /src/Assets/TestProjects/SimpleDependencies #26165
    Area-Infrastructure, dependencies
  • Bump Newtonsoft.Json from 9.0.1 to 13.0.1 in /src/Assets/TestProjects/CompilationContext/TestApp #26164
    Area-Infrastructure, dependencies
  • Bump Newtonsoft.Json from 7.0.1 to 13.0.1 in /src/Assets/TestProjects/CrossTargeting/NetStandardAndNetCoreApp #26163
    Area-Infrastructure, dependencies
  • Bump Newtonsoft.Json from 9.0.1 to 13.0.1 in /src/Assets/TestProjects/KitchenSink/TestLibrary #26162
    Area-Infrastructure, dependencies
  • implemented in-proc callbacks for dotnet operations #26155
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Fix available typo and XML typo #26139
    good first issue
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #26048
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #26150
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #26144
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #26117
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Update the default to Release for Pack/Pub in command building #25991
    Area-NetSDK
  • Support workload pack groups for repair, download, and show URL operations #25829
  • Update the RID target from lower Linux to the latest one #25909
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [24068] Remove Legacy -- behavior and use of UnparsedTokens #25854
    Area-Infrastructure
  • add rules to catch addition or removal of 'virtual' modifier #25734
    Area-Compatibility
  • Adds default outputProperties Item #12030
  • Change BrotliCompress response files to quote file paths #26077
    Servicing-consider, Area-CLI, 6.0.3xx
  • Allow dotnet workload update print-download-link-only to work with when update available in newer feature band #25669
    Area-Workloads
  • [Blazor] Add support for RazorLangVersion 7.0 #24383
    Area-AspNetCore
  • For build-from-source builds of .NET, opt-out of Microsoft telemetry #25935
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use the Implicit SDK RID for RID-Specific Apps by Default #26143
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-22
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Champion: Name lookup for simple name when target type known #2926
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: Static abstract members in interfaces #4436
    Working Set

PullRequests

Merged

  • Document speakable type name for top-level statements #6230

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • No error reported for duplicate `ref` in lambda signature #62085
  • DateTime tooltip is US format #62082
  • Untyped lambda parameters should infer `scoped` from target delegate #62080
  • IntelliSense suggests the "String" class, not the "string" keyword #62079
    17.4
  • Behavior difference between "a is not X" and "!(a is X)" patterns #62078
  • Remove unused parameter (IDE0060) on parameter used by [InterpolatedStringHandlerArgument] #62077
  • Improper IDE0004 Cast is Redundant Suggestion for Delegates Conversion #62072

Closed

  • record primary constructor does not have CompilerGenerated attribute #62073
    17.3
  • Refactoring: Move Static Members to Another Type #55127
    17.3
  • Implement "Top-level statements" feature #41704
  • u8 literals should support literal concatenation #60896
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't load parts early from MEF that aren't needed #62090
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid intermediary allocation in Incremental Driver #62089
    Area-Compilers
  • Address comments referencing work items in features/ref-fields #62088
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Avoid cascading diagnostics on error base type #62087
    Area-Compilers
  • Make more command handlers synchronous #62086
    Area-IDE
  • Revert 61669 62019 #62081
    Area-IDE
  • Adjust spec quotes in ConversionBase.AddTypesParticipatingInUserDefinedConversion to incorporate abstract statics in interfaces #62076
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Fix NRE in VisualBasicAddExplicitCastCodeFixProvider #62075
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Standardize references to the UTF-8 term in code and comments/documentation #62074
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Use syntaxtrees in incremental processing to avoid unnecessary work #62071
    Area-Compilers
  • EnC: Log more info to in-memory buffer to simplify dump analysis #62070
    Area-Interactive

Merged

  • Use the AzDO Agent's copy of git #62061
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #62084
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #62083
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62069
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Use VisualStudioWorkspaceImpl to perform navigation for Inheritance margin #62053
    Area-IDE
  • Adjust caching logic when a `NodeStateTable` is empty #62068
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Add correctness check that only runs analyzers #62035
    Area-IDE
  • Integrate generator times into /reportAnalyzer #61661
    Area-Compilers
  • ✨ Implement ImmutableSegmentedHashSet<T> #54719
    Area-Compilers
  • Document Outline Feature #61784
    Area-IDE
  • Add `CompilerGeneratedAttribute` to `EqualityContract` property #61993
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • File types emit #61646
    Area-Compilers
  • Add Integration tests for Inheritance margin #62047
    Area-IDE
  • Read syntax tree, source text and options synchronously in command handlers #62002
    Area-IDE, 17.3
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.2 #62045
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update test to reflect enum behavior change #61456
    Area-Compilers

  • Add syntax only provider #62067

  • Improve the experience of completion around required members #62065

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blazor] Maui windows apps can't find _framework/blazor.modules.json #42349

  • Blazor custom events incorrect currentTarget #42344

  • The role is not defined for "Remember me" checkbox on the login page. #42342
    7.0-preview7

    7.0-preview7
  • DotNetStreamReference could not be found #42340
  • QuickGrid known issues #42338
    7.0-preview7
  • No asterisk marks are provided for the required fields #42337
  • Blazor Wasm Published Failed with Lazy Loading #42336
  • The Color contrast ratio of the focus indicator of the "Reset Password" button is less than 3:1. #42335
  • npm start fails on Default angular Template #42334
    Backlog

Closed

  • Quarantine H3 Client Cert optional tests #41894

  • Add generic method overloads to Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Results static class #41724
    7.0-preview6
  • Standalone Blazor WASM with Azure Static App causes net::ERR_HTTP2_PROTOCOL_ERROR #42203

  • Blazor WASM with Static Web App Random net::ERR_HTTP2_PROTOCOL_ERROR #42256

  • Open `Index.razor` by default in `blazorserver`, `blazorwasm` templates #42330
  • [Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.OpenIdConnect] Manage Oidc workflow in a popup #42307
  • Design proposal: Bind get/set/after modifiers #39837
    7.0-preview6
  • Azure Web Swaps Warmup Pings Do Not Support HTTPS #41231
    Discussions

PullRequests

Created

  • Implement analyzer that suggests using builder.Services to ConfigureServices method #42356

  • Add analyzer issue #35816 #42354

    area-mvc, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies
  • Implementing analyzer to prefer WebApplicationBuilder.Configuration over Configure methods #42351

Merged

  • Output caching middleware #41037
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview6
  • Update submodule #42357
  • Empty Blazor Server Project Template #42079
    area-mvc, area-blazor, feature-templates, 7.0-preview6
  • Empty Blazor WebAssembly Project Template #42215
    area-mvc, area-blazor, feature-templates, 7.0-preview6
  • Fix H3 Client Cert tests #42346
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview6
  • Fix up parsing of IIS settings in user-jwts #42350
    area-commandlinetools, area-web-frameworks, feature-userjwts, 7.0-preview6
  • Add support for multi-segment parameters to gRPC JSON transcoding #42315
    area-grpc, 7.0-preview6
  • Log error when exception occurs during streaming #42283
    area-signalr, community-contribution, 7.0-preview6
  • Add generic method overloads to Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.Results static class #42176
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview6
  • [Blazor] Compiler runtime APIs needed for bind:get, bind:set, bind:after #40143

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Shadow crashes the app when used on root element of a ViewCell #8252
  • MediaPicker: Massive file size difference between "capturing" and "picking" an image in iOS #8251
  • MAUI - XAML - Object reference not set to an instance of an object. #8249
  • [All] SwapChainPanel #8248
  • [WinUI] Silent crash when updating binding at runtime while thumb scrolling #8247
  • Rating bar not found in MAUI controls #8246
  • NavigationPage gets crashed with release mode in Android #8245
  • IOS: Custom font icon is not rendered in a shell tabbar tab #8244
  • Google maps not working - Unable to retrieve flag snapshot for com.google.android.libraries.consentverifier #8242
  • WebView HTML5 Games not loading #8241
  • Update FlexLayout engine to remove need for measure mode hacks #8240
  • ListView with resizing ViewCell has strange behaviour on iOS #8239
  • WinUI layout bugged #8238
  • Application.Current.RequestedThemeChanged event only raises once #8236
  • Interactive objects on Canvas as in WPF #8235
  • Error running MAUI Blazor Application (.Net 6) using Xamarin.Firebase.Messaging #8233
  • Editor in .Net MAUI does not take full width when inside a stack/grid layout #8232
  • builder.Services.BuildServiceProvider() returns null on iOS #8231
  • Shell.Current.FlyoutIsPresented = true does not toggle the first time on Android #8226
  • Having multiple pages for a Modal scenario using NavigationPage breaks the separation of NavigationStack and ModalStack #8225
  • Hot Reload not reflect Frame property changes #8223

Closed

  • RC2 - The BackgroundColor of the BoxView does not work #6592
    6.0-servicing
  • XAML Hot Reload timed out attempting to connect to the deployed application. Try rebuilding and redeploying EST. #8227
  • RC2 - The Grid keeps a height and width at 0 ignoring FillAndExpand #6731
    6.0-sr2
  • Toggle visibility ok when start as IsVisible="True", but not when starting IsVisible="False" #8185
  • In MVVM mode, the Android collectionView does not update the UI properly #8187
  • Exception in SslStream.AuthenticateAsClient in net6.0-android project, works in Xamarin.Android #8224
  • Setup Hot Restart doesn't work #8202
  • ZIndex crashes on Published builds #7331
    6.0-sr2
  • Maui `main` Installation Failed #8218
  • Publish .NET MAUI Application as Windows Executable #7789
  • [libc] Fatal signal 11 (SIGSEGV), code 2 (SEGV_ACCERR) on Latest MAUI #8195
  • MAUI Dependencies cause issues when updating the MAUI workload with 3rd party dependencies #8032

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Newtonsoft.Json from 12.0.3 to 13.0.1 in /src/Compatibility/ControlGallery/test/Xamarin.Forms.Core.macOS.UITests #8256
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, dependencies
  • Bump Newtonsoft.Json from 12.0.3 to 13.0.1 in /src/Compatibility/Maps/src/GTK #8255
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, dependencies
  • [layout] avoid IView[] creation in LayoutExtensions #8250
    area/perf 🏎️

Merged

  • Make sure the AutoImports.props is only included once per .NET version #8204
    area/single project ☝️, blocker, 6.0-sr2
  • Run the Templates test on implicit and explicit TFMs #8237
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️, 6.0-sr2
  • [android] avoid View.Context during CollectionView scrolling #8243
    area/perf 🏎️
  • Make VisualElement.ZIndexProperty BP public #8184
    area/layout 🔲, .NET 7
  • Make the loc base branch a variable #8230
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Clean up whitespace #8188
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Apply template values for project item templates #8220
    blocker, area/templates 📄, 6.0-sr2
  • Bump NSubstitute from 4.2.2 to 4.3.0 #7928
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Google from 6.0.5 to 6.0.6 #8060
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #8221
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • [net7] include net6 templates #8203
    area/setup 🪄, area/templates 📄
  • Handler allocation tests #8177
  • Fixup Flyout Template Parts #8022
    area/shell 🐢, 6.0-sr2
  • Add Debug logger to MAUI templates #8180
    area/hosting 🧩
  • Wait to fire nav events until page exists #8219
    area/lifecycle 🔁
  • Measure Images in FlexLayout at full size #8216
    area/layout 🔲
  • [Android] Fix issue clipping ImageButton #7724
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton, 6.0-sr2
  • [Android] Fix issue creating ColorStateLists from extension methods #7527
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-checkbox, 6.0-sr2
  • Merge Maui.Graphics into Maui! #8147

  • [Android] Fix clear button not working on Entry #7992
